parameter_calculations.py¶

Module for calculating parameters for files from user input as well as the mfdp template file

ncsd_python.multi_modules.parameter_calculations.Ngs_func(Z, N)¶

calculates Ngs: number of excitations in ground state

but I didn’t want to call this function Ngs, so I could use Ngs for the variable later

ncsd_python.multi_modules.parameter_calculations.Nmin_HO(Z)¶

helper function for Ngs_func

ncsd_python.multi_modules.parameter_calculations.calc_params(MinParams instance, MFDPParams instance)¶

–> MFDPParams, BatchParams to be written into a folder for an NCSD run

Calculates all parameters needed for an NCSD run, using manual parameters input by the user (man_params) and a set of defaults

ncsd_python.multi_modules.parameter_calculations.nucleus(Z, N)¶

returns the name of a nucleus in ‘Li8’ style

NPSM
